comments.body:
The license file is missing from the source distribution. I've put in a PR to fix this:
https://github.com/pepkit/peppy/pull/354

For now you'll need to manually package the license file:
https://conda-forge.org/docs/maintainer/adding_pkgs.html#packaging-the-license-manually

Also above the `license_file` entry, please put the following comment as a reminder that if the PR is merged, the license file will be available in a future release at which point, the manually packaged copy can be removed:

```
# License file manually. Check the status of https://github.com/pepkit/peppy/pull/354 for future releases
license_file: "LICENSE.txt"
...
```
